raw_comment: I see this grpah and it looks like the majority of the 15 -24 year old from countries around the world are beganing to be more optomistic and saying tht the world is becoming a better palce
ace_sentences: The graph shows people who are 15 years old or older and 24 years old or younger.
These people are from countries around the world.
The majority of these people are becoming more optimistic.
The majority of these people say that the world is becoming a better place.
